verbs.description: Attempts by Congress to [V: legalize] [ARG1: Dreamers] were feeble and unsuccessful earlier this year , largely because Trump ’s heart was n’t in it .
[ARG1: Attempts by Congress to legalize Dreamers] [V: were] [ARG2: feeble and unsuccessful] [ARGM-TMP: earlier this year] , [ARGM-CAU: largely because Trump ’s heart was n’t in it] .
Attempts by Congress to legalize Dreamers were feeble and unsuccessful earlier this year , largely because [ARG1: Trump ’s heart] [V: was] [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [ARG2: in it] .
